channel.title: Need help testing moves
channel.description: I'm starting to gather help for an alpha playtest (Reddit post [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/PBtA/comments/dbtx8c/seeking_alpha_test_gms/) if you're interested in GM-ing), and I'm looking for help testing out my moves and how well they trigger. How do you gather advice or testing other than the obvious (just playing with your normal groups)?

item.title: Need help testing moves
item.dc:creator: @ghostPepperWonton
item.description:
@ghostPepperWonton wrote:

I’m starting to gather help for an alpha playtest (Reddit post here if you’re interested in GM-ing), and I’m looking for help testing out my moves and how well they trigger. How do you gather advice or testing other than the obvious (just playing with your normal groups)?

Read full topic
